description: The non-linear phase tap changer describes the non-linear behavior of a phase tap changer. This is a base class for the symmetrical and asymmetrical phase tap changer models. The details of these models can be found in the IEC 61970-301 document.

contents.name: voltageStepIncrement
contents.description: The voltage step increment on the out of phase winding specified in percent of nominal voltage of the transformer end.

contents.name: xMax
contents.description: The reactance depend on the tap position according to a "u" shaped curve. The maximum reactance (xMax) appear at the low and high tap positions.

contents.name: xMin
contents.description: The reactance depend on the tap position according to a "u" shaped curve. The minimum reactance (xMin) appear at the mid tap position.
